resources.string: Need some information or help getting started using the app? Read the guide.
Are you sure you want to stop the survey? All data will be lost!
Start the survey once ready in order to start collecting data.
There are currently no profiles, create a profile using the 'new profile' button.
As an observer on a vessel, you are looking for debris that is floating in the sea and recording it while sighted.

Each survey will take 1 hour, which requires full attention and sufficient batttery of your device. As an observer it is important to choose the best side of the vessel related to sunlight and wind conditions. The observer's standing point must remain the same during the entire 1 hour visual survey.
To start a new visual survey, you can navigate back to the 'Welcome' page of the Ocean Cleanup Visual Survey App. Choose 'Start a new survey' to start with the 1-hour sighting.
Before you start a new survey, it is important that you have filled in your personal and vessel details. This enables us to link the survey-data to the right vessel and team.

To setup your observer profile, you can navigate back to the 'Welcome' page of the Ocean Cleanup Visual Survey App. Choose 'Ready to get started' to fill in your personal and vessel details. We will ask you to fill in the name of the oberserver, the data recorder, the platform height and the name of your vessel. You will be able to update or delete this information when necessary.
Is the answer to your question not available in this guide? Do you experience a problem with the use of the app or when conducting a survey? Please don't hesitate to contact us.
